name: time loop (Zion arts)
description:
hello welcome to time loop most things are explained in game but i will write stuff here too also the intro and secret ending require audio :p there is also 20 levels and 2 endings

currently planned things: bug fixes and small features before jam voting, dev dlc after voting.

controls

  • arrow keys to move
  • r to rewind time
  • space to skip cutscenes
  • enter to go to next level
  • esc to go back to menu
  • p to pause game

story

you are a time traveler who has to save the universe from a stupid time traveler who accidentally got a time machine and he broke the space time continuum you have to kill time bugs to fix the space time continuum but time itself stands in your way some you use a experimental time machine to rewind time and have the ability to kill time bugs.
